parameters.name: PDir1
parameters.description: Entity that defines the extraction direction (see Remarks )

parameters.name: PDir2
parameters.description: Entity that defines the extraction direction (see Remarks )

title: ICoreFeatureData.SetExtractionDirection
description: Sets the entities that define the extraction direction of this core feature.
signature:
System.Boolean SetExtractionDirection( 
   System.Object
PDir1
,
   System.Object
PDir2
)

parameters.name: PDir1
parameters.description: Entity that defines the extraction direction (see Remarks )

parameters.name: PDir2
parameters.description: Entity that defines the extraction direction (see Remarks )

returns: True if the entities that define the extraction direction of this core feature are set, false if not
remarks:
The types of entities that define the extraction direction are:
Face
Plane
Edge
Vertex
Sketch line
Sketch point
There can be two entities because two sketch points can specify a direction.
